videos.name: Cebu Tourism Ad 2021 ft. Steffi Rose Aberasturi by Empire Philippines
videos.description: Uploaded by Empire Philippines, the video shows the places you can visit and activities you can take part it. It features Steffi Rose Aberasturi who got 2nd runner up in Binibining Pilipinas. The video shows the places you can visit even during the pandemic and how Cebu is ready for visitors at that time.

videos.name: Cebu, Philippines - Tourism Advertisement
videos.description: This comprehensive video provides an in-depth exploration of Cebu's rich history, vibrant economy, intriguing facts, captivating tourist spots, lively festivals, and a myriad of exciting activities to engage in while visiting the city.

videos.name: It's more fun in Cebu, Philippines. International Tourism Ad Campaign by DOT
videos.description: This captivating video, endorsed by the Department of Tourism (DOT), serves as a promotional tool for Cebu, showcasing a wide array of breathtaking tourist spots that can be discovered in this enchanting city.

videos.name: CEBU Island Philippines: Island Hopping and Tours Like Never Before! by Our Awesome Planet
videos.description: An engaging promotional video showcasing a variety of exhilarating activities available in Cebu's stunning bodies of water, such as island hopping and free-diving.

videos.name: Cebu Philippines Travel Guide by We Wander
videos.description: A blog by We Wander which shows you the places that they visited which can also be used as a guide for your next trip to Cebu.

videos.name: Tourist Attractions to go to Cebu by PHDOTNET
videos.description: This video shows that top 30 tourist spots that you can visit while in Cebu
